extendedInfo.description: Mobilize your banking and access your CPB accounts from your Androidâ¢ phone with the official Central Pacific Bank App. [1]HIGHLIGHTS:- Check balances, view transaction history, pay bills, transfer money, and contact us.[2]- Need cash fast? Locate CPB ATMâs near you.- Secure and easy access to your accounts with a unique 4-digit mobile PIN code.[3]SECURITY:Your personal information is protected by industry standard 128-bit encryption technology that is the same level of security protection (SSL) as CPB Online Banking.Multi-factor authentication with your secure online banking credentials and unique mobile PIN code provides added security.FEATURES:- View account balances on all accounts- View recent transactions on all accounts- Transfer funds between eligible CPB accounts [2]- Pay bills from checking- Find the nearest CPB branch or ATM- Contact our Customer Service CenterREQUIREMENTS:Must be enrolled in CPB Online Banking to access account information. Go towww.centralpacificbank.com/mobile for additional information.SUPPORT:Submit mobile support issues and questions via email to mobile@centralpacificbank.com orcontact our Customer Service Center at 808-544-0500 or toll free at 1-800-342-8422.For further information go to www.centralpacificbank.com/mobileFAQ or visit your nearest CPB branch.Check out CPBâs entire suite of mobile offerings including SMS Text Banking, and the mobile optimized website with a variety of features that are accessible from any web-enabled device. Learn more at www.centralpacificbank.com/mobile NOTES AND DISCLOSURES:[1] Must be a CPB Online Banking customer and enrolled in CPB Mobile Banking to use this service.[2] Transaction limitations may apply.[3] CPB Online Banking Customers need to login to their CPB account from a desktop or tablet computer via www.centralpacificbank.com to enroll in CPB Mobile Banking. Upon enrollment, customers will provide their own unique mobile PIN code.Your mobile carrier may charge for text messaging and data.Central Pacific Bank, Member FDIC

reviews.title: It\'s not complicated People
reviews.comment: Mahalo nui loa CPB! 6 stars!! I created my mobile PIN code on the full website & now it\'s good fo go. App options are very helpful & user friendly. It\'s a simple, easy-to-navigate kine app.  (FYI People: the \"instructions\" are listed under Requirements for this app. Not complicated if you can read.) Excited about the next update already!
reviews.author: A. Moana Pulelehua

reviews.title: I have an account
reviews.comment: Won\'t let me log on to this site I do it online with the same username it goes through with no problem but when I log on here keeps telling me to call a 1 800 number am uninstalling
reviews.author: marilyn bolton

reviews.title: Give instructions here!!!
reviews.comment: CPB should provide sign-up instructions HERE instead of referring users to a telephone number.  Their current practice is driven by Marketing bullsh*t decisions instead of customer service. FYI: Set-up must be done through your EXISTING on-line account via a web browser...
reviews.author: Carson Axtell

reviews.title: It\'s a start
reviews.comment: Omg I am so so happy that CPB came out with an app. I been waiting for this. It\'s a good start only in time I\'m sure this app will get better. It\'s a start. Ill better my rating as the app gets better. I hope CPB is considering mobile deposit. Omg if they had mobile deposit I\'m done. The world would be perfect. Way to to CPB now let\'s improve on this.
reviews.author: Shy Kamai

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: To get access using this app you must first go to the full website and enable mobile banking. It falls under \"online services\" at the top and then click on \"mobile banking.\" Then you will have access to this app.
reviews.author: Chase Kurokawa
